文献ID: STP1132-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_9th Volume_019_chunk1
证据片段: About 400 pressure-tubes made of cold-worked $\mathsf { Z r } { \mathsf { - } } 2 . 5 \mathsf { N b }$ are used in a CANDU power reactor to contain the nuclear fuel and the heat transport fluid, heavy water, at between 250 to $3 1 0 \mathrm { { } \mathrm { { c } } }$ at a pressure of about $1 0 \ \mathrm { { M P a } }$

文献ID: STP1132-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_9th Volume_019_chunk1
证据片段: The in-core, primary coolant containment of CANDU nuclear reactors are tubes, $6 . 3 \textrm { m }$ long with an inside diameter of $1 0 3 ~ \mathrm { m m }$ and a wall thickness of $4 . 2 \ \mathrm { m m }$ , made from coldworked $\mathsf { Z r } { - } 2 . 5 \mathsf { N b }$ alloy.

文献ID: STP1132-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_9th Volume_019_chunk1
证据片段: The pressure tubes contain $\mathrm { U O } _ { 2 }$ -fuel and heat transport $\mathrm { D } _ { 2 } \mathrm { O }$ at a pressure of about $1 0 \mathbf { M P a }$ and at a temperature ranging from 250 to $2 6 5 \mathrm { { ^ \circ C } }$ at the inlet ends to 290 to $3 1 5 \mathrm { ^ \circ C }$ at the outlet ends.

文献ID: STP1132-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_9th Volume_019_chunk1
证据片段: Test materials were taken from pressure tubes removed from CANDU reactors after up to about 15 years of service, with fluences up to $9 \ \times \ 1 0 ^ { 2 5 } \ \mathrm { n } / \mathrm { m } ^ { 2 }$ $E > 1$ MeV).3

文献ID: STP1132-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_9th Volume_019_chunk1
证据片段: The tubes are produced by extrusion at about $8 1 5 \mathrm { { ‰} }$ , followed by a final $2 5 \%$ cold-draw
